languages.text: {n}Запустив руку в открытую рану, он сминает стальными пальцами хрупкий аугмент и вырывает. За искореженным куском металла тянутся провода и жилы, кровь хлещет из язвы на груди.{/n}

{n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Запустив руку в открытую рану, он сминает стальными пальцами хрупкий аугмент и вырывает. За искореженным куском металла тянутся провода и жилы, кровь хлещет из язвы на груди.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augment with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to pour out.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは開いた傷口に手を入れ、金属製の指で壊れやすいオーグメティックを潰し、引きちぎる。金属片はワイヤーと静脈を引きずり出し、血が吹き飛んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは開いた傷口に手を入れ、金属製の指で壊れやすいオーグメティックを潰し、引きちぎる。金属片はワイヤーと静脈を引きずり出し、血が吹き飛んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡将手指伸进敞开的伤口，用金属手指揉碎了某个脆弱的植入物，之后将它扯了下来。金属碎片扯断了电线与静脉，一小股鲜血从帕斯卡身体里涌了出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡将手指伸进敞开的伤口，用金属手指揉碎了某个脆弱的植入物，之后将它扯了下来。金属碎片扯断了电线与静脉，一小股鲜血从帕斯卡身体里窜了出来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal hunde la mano en la herida abierta, arruga el frágil aumético con sus dedos metálicos y lo arranca. La pieza metálica arrastra cables y venas, provocando que brote un torrente de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hunde la mano en la herida abierta, arruga el frágil aumético con sus dedos metálicos y lo arranca. La pieza metálica arrastra cables y venas, provocando un torrente de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal taucht seine Hand in die offene Wunde, zerknüllt die empfindliche Augmentation mit seinen metallenen Fingern und reißt sie heraus. Als das Metallteil Kabel und Venen mitreißt, ergießt sich ein Schwall Blut aus der Wunde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal taucht seine Hand in die offene Wunde, zerknüllt die fragile Augmentation mit seinen metallenen Fingern und reißt sie heraus. Das Metallteil reißt Kabel und Venen mit, ein Blutschwall ergießt sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal enfonce sa main dans la plaie béante, saisit l'augmétique fragile de ses doigts métalliques et l'arrache sans autre forme de procès, entraînant câbles et veines qui déversent un torrent de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal enfonce sa main dans la plaie béante, saisit l'augmétique fragile de ses doigts métalliques et l'arrache sans autre forme de procès, entraînant câbles et veines qui déversent un torrent de sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, elini açık yarasına soktuğu gibi metal parmaklarıyla ezdiği narin ogmetikleri sökerek çıkarıyor. Söktüğü metal parçası, bazı kablo ve damarları da beraberinde sürükleyip bir kan selinin fışkırmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sinks his hand into the open wound, crumples the fragile augmetic with his metal fingers, and tears it out. The metal piece drags wires and veins along, causing a torrent of blood to gush forth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, elini açık yarasına soktuğu gibi metal parmaklarıyla narin ogmetikleri ezip sökerek çıkarıyor. Söktüğü metal parçası, bazı kablo ve damarları da beraberinde sürükleyip bir kan selinin fışkırmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
